page.title: 10Attitudes
page.content: When you read this page, we wonder what year it will be. 2085? 2185? We wonder who you are, what age, and where you are reading this. We travelled to our block by minibus which seats about 15. Do you have cars and the dirty combustion engine? How fast and how far can you travel? What sort of breakfast do you eat? Do you still have eggs? Do you still eat meat? Are there places called Schools or do you learn everything by computer? Do you have watches with hands? We have lots of machinery in our homes, but do you have robots? We live in houses with gardens. We wonder if you have space for gardens to grow flowers. Are there fields of wheat and orchards with fruit trees? Do you have democracy? We wonder....
